name: Totem Season [indev]
description:
Early preview of the survival sandbox game, inspired by Factorio, Don't Starve and Forager.

The game in it's current state doesn't contain a lot of content, gameplay mechanics or fun. But it does contain bugs.

We have a big roadmap for the game, so expect a bunch more in the future. Game development takes time :^(

Plans for the future:

  • Farming system
  • Animals
  • Combat system
  • Automatization
  • Fishing
  • Multiplayer
  • Dungeons
  • Not sure about dragons tho

If you're interested in the development of the game, want to share your feedback or found a bug - you can find us here: 

discord: https://discord.gg/yvc4cfuvH8
